fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2024e1.utils

Class Measure<T extends java.io.Serializable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2024e1.utils.TimedEntity
      • fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2024e1.utils.Measure<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MeasureI, TimingI, java.io.Serializable

    public class Measure<T extends java.io.Serializable>
extends TimedEntity
implements MeasureI
    The class Measure implements a scalar measure made on some phenomenon having a value of generic type T and a MeasurementUnit.

    Description

    White-box Invariant

     invariant       measurementUnit != null

    Black-box Invariant

     invariant       true        // no more invariant

    Created on : 2023-11-18

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
